My manifest looks like this:

Manifest-Version=
: 1.0^M
Ant-Version: Apache Ant 1.5.3 ^M
Created-By: Apache Jakarta Maven^M=

Built-By: stack^M
Package: org.archive^M
Build-Jdk: 1.4.2_03^M
Extension-N=
ame: heritrix^M
Specification-Version: ^M
Specification-Vendor: Internet Ar=
chive^M
Specification-Title:
  An open-source, extensible, web-scale, archi=
va^M
 l-quality web crawler project.
  ^M
Implementation-Version: 0.7.1-200=
404230844^M
Implementation-Vendor: Internet Archive^M
Implementation-Vendor=
-Id: ^M
Main-Class: org.archive.crawler.Heritrix^M
^M
~

You using maven rc=
2?  It must be whats putting all of the extension
detail into the manifest =
(We're building with rc1.  I've had difficulty
building with rc2 and need t=
o set aside time to spend figuring the why).

You might also try with SUN 1=
.4.2 JDK.  Looks like you're using 1.4.1.

Thanks for helping out S=F8ren.
=
St.Ack
